snippet: According to court documents, “a henchman” of Chechnya’s president is accused of seeking to assassinate a rival politician in London.
abstract: British government and intelligence services accuse Chechen-born former elite soldier, referred to only as El, of seeking to assassinate Akhmed K Zakayev, political rival of Chechnya's Pres Ramzan A Kadyrov; government lawyers, who are asking to deport him, tell judges that he is threat to national security and has been implicated in a 2009 assassination on behalf of Kadyrov in Vienna.
lead_paragraph: According to court documents, “a henchman” of Chechnya’s president is accused of seeking to assassinate a rival politician in London.

headline.seo: Britain Cites Chechen Plot to Kill Exile
headline.main: Britain Sees Chechen Plot to Kill Exile
headline.print_headline: Britain Sees Chechen Plot To Kill Exile
